description:
"They also had at home a select body of cavalry which excelled in swimming; keeping their arms and horses they crossed the Rhine without breaking their formation."
Tacitus, Historiae, 105 AD.
requirementsTooltip: Research Levy Cavalry or Mounted Training to unlock.
tooltip:
Due to rigorous training, the Batavian cavalrymen were able to cross water in full armour.
Enables the recruitment of Batavian cavalry.
